name: SECURAMGuard
0:
”Alexa, lock the door”
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, set the bedroom light to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With SECURAM Guard skill, you can now interact with the smart lock by voice.
To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your SECURAM Guard account and discover your devices. 

This SECURAM Guard skill allows you to:
* lock/unlock your door
* check the lock status
* turn on/off the light

SECURAM devices that can be controlled:
* SECURAM Touch
* SECURAM EOS
* WIFI SWITCH

Here are the voice commands SECURAM Guard has:
* Alexa,lock the door.
* Alexa,unlock the door.
* Alexa, is the door locked/unlocked?
* Alexa, turn on the light.
* Alexa, set the bedroom light to fifty percent.
